short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Immutable X marketplace Maker & Taker fees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "IMX Fee Remover" is a Chrome extension that helps users save money by removing the 1% Maker and Taker fees on the Immutable X marketplace. 
The 1% Fee will be automaticly be removed for Purchases and Listings.

Here's how it works:

1. When you install the extension or start your browser, it automatically disables the fees by default.

2.  In the background the extension modifies network requests to remove the fee-related parameters from the URL when you interact with the Immutable X marketplace or any other Immutable X marketplace.

3. The extension has a popup window that shows you whether the fees are currently active or disabled. You can use the toggle switch in the popup to turn the fees on or off.

4.Whenever you change the toggle switch, the extension saves your preference and updates the network request rules accordingly.
